item.title: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. OpenAI says it has evidence China’s DeepSeek used its model to train competitor
2. Trump scraps plan to freeze federal loans and grants after backlash
3. Gold stockpiling in New York leads to London shortage
4. The baby gap: why governments can’t pay their way to higher birth rates
5. Trump lashes out at Fed after central bank keeps rates steady
item.guid: FT Most Read: Thursday, January 30, 2025 at 3:15 AM UTC
